title: Cannot sideload ADB Sideload onto Pixel
content:
Does anyone know what it means when I do a adb sideload and it gives the message "adb.exe: sideload requires an argument"?  My phone bricked on me when I tried to do an OTA Update and I followed all teh directions from Techno Bill from this thread:
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/29037052?hl=en
Everything checks out until I go to load the OS and I get this message:
adb.exe: sideload requires an argument
Help!  I'm stuck and can't find any info online regarding this error.
